chapter.title: Managing Record Attributes
chapter.para: Any attribute can be specified via the URI or CMDB class instance. If neither is found, the value is determined from the CloudForms vm or miq_provision objects.
The attributes can be reduced or extended as required by amending the Ruby methods.

note.para: Some attributes are not free text fields, i.e. they must be specific values. An example is Vendor, where the value must already exist in the ServiceNow Vendors table beforehand.
